CustomField.description: API name of the field set on the Milestone object that controls the hover details displayed for a milestone in the Forecast Breakdown grid. If you do not enter a field set, default hover details apply.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: API name of the field set on the Milestone object that controls the hover details displayed for a milestone in the Forecast Breakdown grid. If you do not enter a field set, default hover details apply.
CustomField.label: Hover Details Field Set on Milestone
